mean_cn: n. 男爵（英国世袭的最低级的贵族爵位），大财主
mean_en: a nobleman of the lowest rank. In Britain, barons use the title Lord; in other countries they use the title Baron.; a person who owns or controls a large part of a particular industry
sentence: The baron's hat is a symbol of his nobility.
sentence_trans: 男爵的帽子是一种尊贵的象征。
word_etyma: bar重，压 + on表示人 → baron大财主
